com.giift.sdk.io.wallet

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.io.wallet.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling the card synchronizations with the server
    Author:
    Nicolas Lagier
    See Also:
    Card

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Card.Add 
      static class  Card.Barcode
      Server request that will fetch the barcode associated to a specific card.
      static class  Card.Delete
      Set card status to deleted locally and try to update it on the server Set appropriate sync_status to keep track if the server and local db are in sync
      static class  Card.FetchAll
      Fetch All user cards that have been updated since the last update
      static class  Card.FetchOne 
      static class  Card.PostUpdate
      First updates card values in the local db, then try to update it on the server set the sync_status appropriately
      static class  Card.SyncTransactions
      Server request that will fetch all transactions linked to a card from the server and update it locally.
      static class  Card.Track
      Server request that will trigger a track value request to the program website.

        public Card()

    • Method Detail

      • DeleteAsync

        public static void DeleteAsync(android.content.Context context,
                               @NonNull
                               java.lang.String cardId)
        Send a Delete request to the server. The result can be listened to on the BroadcastReceiver Delete.BROADCAST_ACTION. And the GiiftProvider will provide a notification on the Uri
        Parameters:
        context - context from which the request is sent. This is used to sync the database and create a new service intent
        cardId - id of the card that should be deleted
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • DeleteSync

        public static void DeleteSync(android.content.Context context,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.String cardId)
        Send a Delete request to the server. And the GiiftProvider will provide a notification on the Uri
        Parameters:
        context - context from which the request is sent. This is used to sync the database and create a new service intent
        cardId - id of the card that should be deleted
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • UpdateSync

        public static void UpdateSync(android.content.Context context,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.String cardId)
        Update synchronously the local definition of a card from the server definition. Update includes the card definition, the transactions, the barcode and initializes a track value request. Updates will trigger notifications from the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background service
        cardId - id of the card to be updated.
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • UpdateAsync

        public static void UpdateAsync(android.content.Context context,
                               @NonNull
                               java.lang.String cardId)
        Update asynchronously the local definition of a card from the server definition. Update includes the card definition, the transactions, the barcode and initializes a track value request. Updates will trigger notifications from the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background service
        cardId - id of the card to be updated.
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • UpdateAllAsync

        public static void UpdateAllAsync(android.content.Context context,
                                  @NonNull
                                  java.lang.String userId)
        Update asynchronously the local definition cards from the server definition. This is necessary to have an up to date portfolio view. Updates will trigger notifications from the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background service
        userId - user to be updated
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • PostUpdateAsync

        public static void PostUpdateAsync(android.content.Context context,
                                   android.os.Bundle args,
                                   @NonNull
                                   java.lang.String cardId)
        Send to the server updates of a card. The request is asynchronous. Updates will trigger notifications from the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background service
        args - arguments to be updated
        cardId - id of the card to be updated
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

        public static void PostUpdateSync(android.content.Context context,
                                  android.os.Bundle args,
                                  @NonNull
                                  java.lang.String cardId)
        Send to the server updates of a card. The request is synchronous. Updates will trigger notifications from the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:

        args - arguments to be updated
        cardId - id of the card to be updated
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • AddAsync

        public static void AddAsync(android.content.Context context,
                            @NonNull
                            java.lang.String dmoId)
        Add a card to the current user's portfolio. This method is asynchronous. Updates will trigger notifications from the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background service
        dmoId - dmo to be added to portfolio

      • AddSync

        public static void AddSync(android.content.Context context,
                           @NonNull
                           java.lang.String dmoId)
        Add a card to the current user's portfolio. This method is synchronous. Updates will trigger notifications from the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to initialize the background service
        dmoId - dmo to be added to portfolio
